Online Documentation

General information

Flusspferd (German for Hippopotamus) is a C++ library providing Javascript bindings. Flusspferd uses Mozilla's SpiderMonkey as its underlying Javascript engine but porting it to other engines (like Google's v8) should be easy.

The license is MIT license.

Documentation

Tutorials - find a list of Flusspferd's tutorials.

See JS docs for documentation of the Javascript interface and there is an overview of all core classes in the documentation for namespace flusspferd. Read the flusspferd(1) manpage for more information on the Flusspferd repl/shell.

Other

Our homepage contains other useful information.

Contact us at team -AT- flusspferd -DOT- org or as described on our homepage.
